text:
No way, Kiriko-chan is really cute...!
She's like a cherry blossom fairy come to life!

Hehe... Yes, I'm grateful for all the effort
put into the costume and hair and makeup.

I'm looking forward to the photo shoot.
Please continue to support us!
â”€ Getting such praise feels really good.

Can I become...
like a cherry blossom?

The other day, when you were waiting under the cherry
blossom tree, Kiriko seemed to be in tune with the blossoms.

So...
Kiriko, just be yourself. That's enough.

Please continue to watch over me...
Producer-san.
